steps.name: I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_USER_013 - Verify Get Plants By Category ID

steps.name: I send a GET request to get plants by category ID 5
the response status code should be 200
the response body should not be empty
all plants in the response should belong to category ID 5
each plant should have valid ID, name, price, and quantity

name: Plant API - Get By Category
description:
As a User
  I want to get plants by their category
  So that I can see all plants belonging to a specific category

steps.name: I have a valid user token
I send a DELETE request for a non-existing plant with ID 99999

name: Plant API - Delete Plant
description:
As an Admin
  I want to delete a plant
  So that I can remove plants from the system

steps.name: I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_USER_016 - Verify Get Plant By ID

steps.name: I send a GET request to get plant with ID 17
the response status code should be 200
the plant ID in response should be 17
the plant name should not be null
the plant price should be greater than 0
the plant quantity should be greater than or equal to 0
the plant categoryId should be greater than or equal to 0

name: Plant API - Get By ID
description:
As a User
  I want to get a plant by its ID
  So that I can see the details of a specific plant

steps.name: I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "name" in "asc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "name" in "asc" order
I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "name" in "desc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "name" in "desc" order
I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "price" in "asc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "price" in "asc" order
I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "price" in "desc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "price" in "desc" order
I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "quantity" in "asc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "quantity" in "asc" order
I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_ADM_015 - Verify Pagination and Sorting for All Fields

steps.name: I send a GET request for plants with page 0, size 10, and sort by "quantity" in "desc" order
the response status code should be 200
the response should be sorted by "quantity" in "desc" order

name: Plant API - Pagination and Sorting
description:
As a User
  I want to get paginated and sorted plants
  So that I can browse plants efficiently

steps.name: I have a valid user token

elements.name: TC_API_PLANTS_USER_014 - Verify User Can Access Plant Summary

steps.name: I send a GET request to get plant summary
the response status code should be 200
the summary should contain totalPlants and lowStockPlants
totalPlants and lowStockPlants should be greater than or equal to 0
the response should not contain admin fields "adminData" or "internalStats"

name: Plant API - Summary
description:
As a User
  I want to see the plant summary
  So that I can see high-level statistics of plants

steps.name: I have a valid user token
I send a PUT request to update plant with ID 0 and name "Anthurium"

  So that I can keep plant information up-to-date
